foreignData.name: Rathischer Einschüchterer
foreignData.text:
Der Rathische Einschüchterer kann nur von schwarzen und Artefaktkreaturen geblockt werden.
2, {T}: Durchsuche Deine Bibliothek nach einer Söldnerkarte mit umgewandelten Manakosten von 2 oder weniger und bringe diese Karte ins Spiel. Mische danach Deine Bibliothek.

name: Rathi Intimidator
originalText:
Rathi Intimidator can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and black creatures.
o2, oc
T: Search your library for a Mercenary card with converted mana cost 2 or less and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: Because the “search” requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don’t have to find the card if you don’t want to.

text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
{2}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with mana value 2 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
